title: Calvin Klein Men's Cotton Classics 5-Pack Tanks
description: LIGHTWEIGHT: Durable, 100% pure cotton fabric makes Calvin Klein’s t-shirts for men light and soft for all-day wear.
KEEP COOL: Calvin Klein tees are designed to be naturally ventilating with a breathable feel.
ADAPTABLE STYLE: Go from sporty to sophisticated by pairing CK’s men’s t-shirts with your go-to suit.
CONSIDERED DESIGN: With the perfect fit for everyone , Calvin Klein’s mens t-shirts are designed to pair with everything in your wardrobe—or be worn alone for the ultimate in confident, casual style.
DESIGNED IN THE USA: Calvin Klein’s tee shirts for men are created by its NYC-based global design team using premium imported materials.
Crafted from soft cotton for an effortless feel, Calvin Klein’s iconic men’s t-shirts offer the ultimate in premium comfort.
